brics_3d::IpaDatasetLoader Class Reference

Helper class to load x, y, z and RGB data from IPA like data sets. More...

Detailed Description

Helper class to load x, y, z and RGB data from IPA like data sets.

int  j,
double &  x,
double &  y,
double &  z,
unsigned char &  R,
unsigned char &  G,
unsigned char &  B 
)

Returns to a pair of image coordinates the corresponding color and depth values.

Parameters:
ix-coordinate of image //bool m_initialized;
jy-coordinate of image
xCorresponding x-coordinate of (i,j)-image-pixel
yCorresponding y-coordinate of (i,j)-image-pixel
zCorresponding z-coordinate of (i,j)-image-pixel
RCorresponding red color component of (i,j)-image-pixel
GCorresponding green color component of (i,j)-image-pixel
BCorresponding blue color component of (i,j)-image-pixel
Returns:
True if method successfully finished, false if an error occurred.

IplImage * brics_3d::IpaDatasetLoader::getXYZImage ( )

Returns pointer to the xyz image.

void brics_3d::IpaDatasetLoader::release ( void  )

Releases images if allocated.

Images are freed with cvReleaseImage and set to point to NULL.
